courses.title: Acoustic Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Master the acoustic guitar with fingerpicking techniques and chord progressions.

courses.title: Classical Piano Foundations
courses.description: Learn classical piano techniques, including scales and arpeggios.

courses.title: Vocal Performance Strategies
courses.description: Develop confidence and stage presence with advanced vocal techniques.

courses.title: Percussion Rhythms
courses.description: Explore world percussion and drumming styles to enhance your rhythm skills.

courses.title: Jazz Harmony & Chords
courses.description: Understand jazz harmonies, chord structures, and improvisation techniques.

courses.title: Sound Engineering Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of sound mixing, EQ, and effects processing.

courses.title: Lyric Writing Workshop
courses.description: Craft compelling lyrics and explore storytelling through songwriting.

courses.title: Electronic Sound Design
courses.description: Create rich electronic soundscapes and experiment with synthesizers.

courses.title: Baroque & Classical Composers
courses.description: Analyze the works of famous Baroque and Classical composers.

courses.title: Fingerstyle Blues Guitar
courses.description: Develop blues guitar techniques using fingerstyle picking.
